block.p: Barbra Sue Lewinski was married yesterday in New York to David Andrew Bell. The Rev. Kevin McGrath performed the ceremony at the Roman Catholic Church of St. Vincent Ferrer.

Mrs. Bell, 34, is the vice president for public relations at Bergdorf Goodman in New York. She is a graduate of the University of Wisconsin. Her parents are Suzanne and Robert Lewinski of New Berlin, Wis.
Barbra Sue Lewinski was married yesterday in New York to David Andrew Bell. The Rev. Kevin McGrath performed the ceremony at the Roman Catholic Church of St. Vincent Ferrer.

Mrs. Bell, 34, is the vice president for public relations at Bergdorf Goodman in New York. She is a graduate of the University of Wisconsin. Her parents are Suzanne and Robert Lewinski of New Berlin, Wis.

Mr. Bell, 34, is a director for sales of European stocks at UBS Warburg, the investment bank, in Stamford, Conn. He graduated from Mount Allison University in Canada and received an M.B.A. from the Institut Superieur de Gestion in Paris. He is a son of Phyllis Bell and R. Rogers Bell of Waterloo, Ontario.
